description: This is a Java source file defining a REST controller named HelloController, which provides several basic endpoints such as welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and app info for a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints such as welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info for the notes backend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to indicate the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health check endpoint that returns 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
